madeInAbyss.description: Descend into the unknown. Deep violet mysteries that echo the abyss's call — beautiful, terrifying, and unforgettable.

rubyDawn.name: Ruby Dawn
rubyDawn.description: Bold, unapologetic crimson that bleeds intensity. This isn't just red — it's raw passion, fierce determination, and the fire that burns at the break of day.

scarletFire.name: Scarlet Fire
scarletFire.description: IGNITE! Pure electric energy that screams action. This red doesn't whisper — it roars with unstoppable momentum and demands your attention.

cherryBlossom.name: Cherry Blossom
cherryBlossom.description: Delicate yet defiant. Soft pink petals that bloom with confidence — where gentleness meets strength and spring never ends.

burgundyWine.name: Burgundy Wine
burgundyWine.description: Refined rebellion. Deep, sophisticated elegance that whispers luxury while commanding respect. Aged to perfection, bold by nature.

honeyGold.name: Honey Gold
honeyGold.description: Liquid sunshine that drips with warmth. Sweet, golden radiance that wraps you in comfort and makes every moment feel like golden hour.

butterSunshine.name: Butter Sunshine
butterSunshine.description: Pure joy, pure energy. Cheerful yellow that cuts through the gloom and reminds you that happiness is a choice — and this theme makes it easy.

canaryBright.name: Canary Bright
canaryBright.description: Optimism on steroids. Bright, unapologetic yellow that refuses to dim. This is the color of hope, energy, and unstoppable positivity.

lemonFresh.name: Lemon Fresh
lemonFresh.description: Zing! Zesty citrus that wakes you up and keeps you sharp. Fresh, tangy, and impossible to ignore — like a splash of cold water on a hot day.

chartreuseEnergy.name: Chartreuse Energy
chartreuseEnergy.description: Bold? Try audacious. Yellow-green that doesn't ask permission — it takes over. Electric, vibrant, and absolutely unapologetic.

jadeLuxury.name: Jade Luxury
jadeLuxury.description: Ancient elegance meets modern power. Rich green gemstone that whispers wealth while screaming sophistication. Timeless, precious, unstoppable.

aquaFresh.name: Aqua Fresh
aquaFresh.description: Dive in. Fresh cyan-blue that washes away the noise and leaves you with crystal clarity. Clean, crisp, and refreshingly bold.

ceruleanSky.name: Cerulean Sky
ceruleanSky.description: Infinite calm, infinite depth. Sky blue that stretches forever and reminds you that peace isn't passive — it's powerful.

sapphirePrestige.name: Sapphire Prestige
sapphirePrestige.description: Premium by design, elite by nature. Blue gemstone that doesn't just look expensive — it IS expensive. Command respect, demand attention.

royalElegance.name: Royal Elegance
royalElegance.description: Regal. Majestic. Unquestionably blue. This isn't just a color — it's a statement. Rule your workspace like the monarch you are.

periwinkleDream.name: Periwinkle Dream
periwinkleDream.description: Gentle yet unyielding. Blue-purple that soothes the soul while sharpening the mind. Dreamy, yes — but dreams can be powerful.

amethystMystic.name: Amethyst Mystic
amethystMystic.description: Mystical? Absolutely. Purple that channels ancient wisdom and modern magic. This theme doesn't just look mysterious — it IS mysterious.

mauveElegance.name: Mauve Elegance
mauveElegance.description: Elegant with an edge. Purple-pink that whispers sophistication while packing a punch. Refined rebellion at its finest.

lilacSpring.name: Lilac Spring
lilacSpring.description: Fresh, vibrant, unstoppable. Spring purple that blooms with confidence and refuses to fade. Renewal, rebirth, and raw energy.

wisteriaCalm.name: Wisteria Calm
wisteriaCalm.description: Peaceful? Yes. Weak? Never. Lavender that soothes without surrendering. Calm is a superpower, and this theme proves it.

wineSophisticated.name: Wine Sophisticated
wineSophisticated.description: Mature, complex, intoxicating. Red-purple that's been aged to perfection. This isn't just sophisticated — it's dangerously refined.

copperIndustrial.name: Copper Industrial
copperIndustrial.description: Raw, unrefined power. Warm metallic that screams industrial strength. Built tough, designed bold, engineered to last.

rustNatural.name: Rust Natural
rustNatural.description: Weathered, worn, and absolutely unbreakable. Orange-brown that tells a story of endurance. Age isn't weakness — it's character.

khakiOutdoor.name: Khaki Outdoor
khakiOutdoor.description: Military precision meets outdoor adventure. Green-brown that's ready for anything. Tactical, rugged, unstoppable.

tanComfort.name: Tan Comfort
tanComfort.description: Warm, welcoming, unapologetically cozy. Beige that wraps you in comfort without compromising on style. Soft but never weak.

beigeMinimal.name: Beige Minimal
beigeMinimal.description: Neutral? Yes. Boring? Never. Calm that commands attention through restraint. Minimalism is a statement, and this theme makes it loud.

vanillaSweet.name: Vanilla Sweet
vanillaSweet.description: Soft cream that's anything but plain. Sweet, smooth, and deceptively powerful. Sometimes the simplest things hit the hardest.

champagneCelebration.name: Champagne Celebration
champagneCelebration.description: Elegant gold-white that bubbles with sophistication. Every moment is a celebration, and this theme makes sure you know it.

platinumModern.name: Platinum Modern
platinumModern.description: Cool, cutting-edge, absolutely metallic. Platinum that doesn't just look modern — it defines it. Sleek, sharp, unstoppable.

titaniumTech.name: Titanium Tech
titaniumTech.description: Strong? Try indestructible. Metallic that's built for the future. Tech-forward, bulletproof, and absolutely unbreakable.

steelProfessional.name: Steel Professional
steelProfessional.description: Cool grey-blue that means business. Professional doesn't mean boring — it means powerful, precise, and absolutely in control.

ironStrong.name: Iron Strong
ironStrong.description: Dark, metallic, unyielding. Iron that doesn't bend, doesn't break, doesn't apologize. Strength in its purest form.

eldenRing.name: Elden Ring
eldenRing.description: Golden fantasy epic that demands greatness. This isn't just a theme — it's a legend. Majestic, powerful, and absolutely unforgiving.

darkSouls.name: Dark Souls
darkSouls.description: Dark fantasy despair that embraces the struggle. Every shadow tells a story of endurance. Hard? Yes. Worth it? Absolutely.

bloodborne.name: Bloodborne
bloodborne.description: Gothic horror nightmare that's beautiful in its brutality. Dark, elegant, and absolutely terrifying. Fear is a feature, not a bug.

sekiro.name: Sekiro
sekiro.description: Feudal Japan precision that cuts through everything. Sharp, focused, and absolutely lethal. Perfection isn't a goal — it's a requirement.

celeste.name: Celeste
celeste.description: Mountain climbing adventure that reaches for the stars. Climb higher, push further, never stop. The summit is just the beginning.

ori.name: Ori and the Blind Forest
ori.description: Beautiful forest adventure that blooms with life. Nature's magic meets digital perfection. Gorgeous, enchanting, and absolutely alive.

cuphead.name: Cuphead
cuphead.description: 1930s cartoon style that packs a punch. Retro charm meets modern attitude. Classic, bold, and absolutely unapologetic.

animalCrossing.name: Animal Crossing
animalCrossing.description: Peaceful island life that never gets old. Calm, cozy, and absolutely delightful. Sometimes the best adventures are the quietest ones.

minecraftClassic.name: Minecraft Classic
minecraftClassic.description: Blocky creativity that builds worlds. Simple blocks, infinite possibilities. Classic, timeless, and absolutely limitless.

teamFortress.name: Team Fortress 2
teamFortress.description: Colorful team shooter that never takes itself too seriously. Bold, vibrant, and absolutely chaotic. Fun is mandatory.

left4Dead.name: Left 4 Dead
left4Dead.description: Zombie apocalypse that's as intense as it gets. Dark, gritty, and absolutely relentless. Survival isn't optional — it's everything.

marbleElegance.name: Marble Elegance
marbleElegance.description: Classic white stone that's been polished to perfection. Timeless elegance that never goes out of style. Refined, pure, and absolutely majestic.

moonlightSerenity.name: Moonlight Serenity
moonlightSerenity.description: Peaceful night blue that whispers calm into chaos. Serenity isn't weakness — it's power. Let the moonlight guide you.

neonCyberpunk.name: Neon Cyberpunk
neonCyberpunk.description: Electric future that's already here. Neon-soaked streets, digital dreams, and absolutely no apologies. The future is now, and it's bold.

tropicalParadise.name: Tropical Paradise
tropicalParadise.description: Turquoise and coral that scream vacation vibes. Paradise isn't a place — it's a state of mind, and this theme brings it home.

luxuryGold.name: Luxury Gold
luxuryGold.description: Premium elegance that doesn't just look expensive — it IS expensive. Gold that commands respect and demands attention. Elite by design.

woodNatural.name: Wood Natural
woodNatural.description: Rustic warmth that feels like home. Natural, authentic, and absolutely unpretentious. Sometimes the simplest things are the most powerful.

bladeRunner.name: Blade Runner
bladeRunner.description: Neon crimson in cyberpunk city that bleeds atmosphere. Dark, moody, and absolutely cinematic. The future is neon, and it's beautiful.

starWars.name: Star Wars
starWars.description: Galactic blue and red that screams epic adventure. The Force is strong with this one. May the theme be with you.

google.name: Google
google.description: Colorful and playful that never takes itself too seriously. Bold, vibrant, and absolutely fun. Innovation meets joy.

microsoft.name: Microsoft
microsoft.description: Professional blue that means business. Corporate power meets digital excellence. Built for productivity, designed for success.

netflix.name: Netflix
netflix.description: Bold red streaming that commands attention. Binge-worthy aesthetics for binge-worthy content. Entertainment, elevated.

spotify.name: Spotify
spotify.description: Green music vibes that never stop. Rhythm, energy, and absolutely infectious. Your workspace just got a soundtrack.

discord.name: Discord
discord.description: Blurple community that brings people together. Social, vibrant, and absolutely connected. Where conversations come alive.

github.name: GitHub
github.description: Code green that means business. Developer-approved, productivity-driven, and absolutely essential. Code, commit, conquer.

twitter.name: Twitter
twitter.description: Sky blue social that's always trending. Fast, fresh, and absolutely current. Stay connected, stay informed.

instagram.name: Instagram
instagram.description: Gradient purple to pink that screams creativity. Visual storytelling meets digital perfection. Your feed, your story.

youtube.name: YouTube
youtube.description: Red video platform that's impossible to ignore. Content creation, elevated. Watch, create, dominate.

amazon.name: Amazon
amazon.description: Orange shopping that delivers everything. Bold, reliable, and absolutely unstoppable. Prime time, all the time.

tesla.name: Tesla
tesla.description: Electric red that's charged with innovation. Future-forward, sleek, and absolutely powerful. Drive the future.

nasa.name: NASA
nasa.description: Space blue that reaches for the stars. Infinite possibilities, endless exploration. The final frontier, now on your screen.

starbucks.name: Starbucks
starbucks.description: Green coffee that's always brewing. Caffeinated creativity meets premium aesthetics. Fuel your hustle.

cocaCola.name: Coca-Cola
cocaCola.description: Classic red that's been refreshing the world for generations. Timeless, iconic, and absolutely unforgettable. The real thing.

mcdonalds.name: McDonald's
mcdonalds.description: Golden arches that shine bright. Fast, bold, and absolutely recognizable. I'm lovin' it, and you will too.

forestDawn.name: Forest Dawn
forestDawn.description: Lost in jungle dreams. Jade shadows dance with moss-green whispers and chartreuse dawn — where nature's wild heart beats eternal.

oceanDepths.name: Ocean Depths
oceanDepths.description: Dive into lake serenity. Sapphire depths flow through cerulean currents and aqua tranquility — where peace runs deep and calm never ends.

sunsetBeach.name: Sunset Beach
sunsetBeach.description: Bask on beach paradise. Tangerine sunsets melt into apricot waves and honeyed sands — where vacation never ends and warmth is eternal.

mountainPeak.name: Mountain Peak
mountainPeak.description: Reach for mountain heights. Cerulean peaks pierce aqua skies with periwinkle majesty — where the summit calls and clarity reigns supreme.

autumnLeaves.name: Autumn Leaves
autumnLeaves.description: Embrace the valley's fire. Vermillion leaves burn with rust memories and copper warmth — where autumn's blaze never fades.

springBloom.name: Spring Bloom
springBloom.description: Fresh greens and pinks that burst with life. Renewal, rebirth, and absolutely unstoppable growth. Spring never looked so good.

winterFrost.name: Winter Frost
winterFrost.description: Cool blues and silvers that sparkle with elegance. Crisp, clean, and absolutely pristine. Winter's beauty, captured forever.

ibm.name: IBM
ibm.description: Enterprise precision, engineered. Sapphire trust meets cerulean reliability and steel perfection — where decades of excellence shine.

oracle.name: Oracle
oracle.description: Corporate power, absolute authority. Crimson dominance meets wine prestige and platinum excellence — where business means everything.

adobe.name: Adobe
adobe.description: Creative fire, innovation's spark. Vermillion passion burns with rust intensity and titanium precision — where artistry meets excellence.

salesforce.name: Salesforce
salesforce.description: Cloud blue that scales to infinity. Enterprise power meets cloud flexibility. The sky's the limit, and this theme proves it.

paypal.name: PayPal
paypal.description: Payment blue that you can trust. Secure, reliable, and absolutely essential. When money moves, this theme moves with it.

visa.name: Visa
visa.description: Blue and gold that's accepted everywhere. Classic, trusted, and absolutely universal. The world's payment system, now on your screen.

mastercard.name: Mastercard
mastercard.description: Red and orange that's impossible to miss. Bold, vibrant, and absolutely recognizable. There are things money can't buy, but this theme isn't one of them.

eightiesNeon.name: 80s Neon
eightiesNeon.description: The 80s called — they want their aesthetic back. Neon-pink dreams bleed into neon-cyan nights and neon-blue futures — where retro never dies.

vaporwave.name: Vaporwave
vaporwave.description: A E S T H E T I C perfection. Pastel-pink dreams float through aqua waves and periwinkle skies — where nostalgia meets surreal beauty.

synthwave.name: Synthwave
synthwave.description: The future that never was, now on your screen. Tangerine sunsets pulse with amethyst dreams and wisteria nights — where synth-driven nostalgia never ends.

retroGaming.name: Retro Gaming
retroGaming.description: Game over? Never. Game on? Always. Neon-green pixels clash with neon-pink chaos and neon-cyan glory — where arcade perfection lives forever.

doomEternal.name: Doom Eternal
doomEternal.description: Rip and tear, until it is done. Crimson hellfire burns with wine darkness and maroon fury — where demons fear to tread.

tronLegacy.name: Tron Legacy
tronLegacy.description: Enter the grid. Neon-cyan circuits pulse with neon-blue energy and aqua brilliance — where digital dreams become reality.

massEffect.name: Mass Effect
massEffect.description: Commander, the galaxy awaits. Royal majesty meets periwinkle stars and amethyst nebulas — where space opera dreams come true.

borderlands.name: Borderlands
borderlands.description: Welcome to Pandora. Tangerine wastelands burn with vermillion chaos and rust decay — where cell-shaded madness never ends.

bioshock.name: BioShock
bioshock.description: Would you kindly? Honey elegance flows with butter luxury and champagne decadence — where art deco meets underwater dreams.

muted90s.name: Muted 90s
muted90s.description: Dusty colors of a forgotten decade. Retro vibes that hit different. When dial-up was king and aesthetics were simpler. Throwback to the good old days.

dispatch.name: Dispatch
dispatch.description: Terminal aesthetics meet tactical precision. Clean, functional, and absolutely no-nonsense. When you need results, not excuses.

teardown.name: Teardown
teardown.description: Voxel destruction meets strategic chaos. Every pixel matters, every action counts. Build, destroy, rebuild. The cycle of creation through demolition.

drumsOfLiberation.name: Drums of Liberation
drumsOfLiberation.description: Gear 5 energy unleashed. Yellow lightning crackles through every pixel. Freedom, joy, and absolute power. When you're not just playing — you're liberating.

gear5.name: Gear 5
gear5.description: The peak of transformation. Golden energy flows through your interface. Joy, freedom, and unstoppable momentum. The ultimate form, now on your screen.

luck.name: Luck
luck.description: Fortune favors the bold. Green and gold dance together in perfect harmony. When opportunity knocks, this theme answers. Your lucky day starts here.

jujutsuKaisen.name: Jujutsu Kaisen
jujutsuKaisen.description: Cursed energy flows through dark corridors. Purple and blue create an atmosphere of mystery and power. Domain expansion, now in your interface.

towel.name: Towel
towel.description: Soft, comforting, and absolutely essential. The most underrated tool in the universe. Simple, warm, and always there when you need it. Don't panic.

shit.name: Shit
shit.description: Bold, earthy, and unapologetically honest. Sometimes you need to call things what they are. Brown, real, and absolutely no filter. When subtlety is overrated.

pipBoy.name: Pip-Boy
pipBoy.description: The iconic green terminal interface from Fallout. Vault-Tec approved. Nuclear wasteland aesthetic meets retro computing. Perfect for wandering the wasteland or debugging code.

programming.name: Programming
programming.description: Modern developer workspace. Clean, focused, and optimized for long coding sessions. Where syntax highlighting meets productivity.

outlast.name: Outlast
outlast.description: Horror that seeps into your soul. Dark, twisted, and absolutely terrifying. Red light in the darkness. Survival is not guaranteed, but fear is.

phasmophobia.name: Phasmophobia
phasmophobia.description: Eerie purple light in haunted darkness. Ghosts, mysteries, and the unknown. When fear is your constant companion. The paranormal, now on your screen.

fnaf1.name: FNAF 1
fnaf1.description: The original nightmare begins. Red and yellow in the darkness. Animatronics move, time ticks away. Five nights, endless terror. The pizzeria awaits.

fnaf2.name: FNAF 2
fnaf2.description: The sequel that upped the ante. Bright colors hide darker secrets. More animatronics, less time. The party continues, but so does the fear.

fnaf3.name: FNAF 3
fnaf3.description: Green decay in abandoned halls. Springtrap roams the shadows. The past comes back to haunt you. Thirty years later, the nightmare persists.

fnaf4.name: FNAF 4
fnaf4.description: Nightmares in a child's room. Dark purple and blue shadows. The fear is real, the monsters are closer. The bedroom becomes a prison.

fnafSisterLocation.name: FNAF: Sister Location
fnafSisterLocation.description: Futuristic blue underground. Clean surfaces hide mechanical horrors. The facility runs deep, and so do the secrets. Tech meets terror.

fnafPizzeriaSimulator.name: FNAF: Pizzeria Simulator
fnafPizzeriaSimulator.description: Orange and yellow manage chaos. Run a pizzeria, avoid the animatronics. Business meets survival. The ultimate test of multitasking under pressure.

fnafUltimateCustomNight.name: FNAF: Ultimate Custom Night
fnafUltimateCustomNight.description: Neon chaos in a personalized hell. Every animatronic, every nightmare. Customize your own terror. When fifty animatronics are not enough.

fnafHelpWanted.name: FNAF: Help Wanted
fnafHelpWanted.description: VR nightmares in metallic silver. The terror is immersive, the fear is real. Virtual reality meets actual horror. Put on the headset, if you dare.

fnafSecurityBreach.name: FNAF: Security Breach
fnafSecurityBreach.description: Neon pink and blue in a mega mall. Bright colors hide dark secrets. The animatronics are bigger, the chase is longer. The pizzaplex never sleeps.

fnafRuin.name: FNAF: Ruin
fnafRuin.description: Rust and decay in the aftermath. The pizzaplex has fallen, but the horror remains. Broken, dark, and absolutely haunting. The end is only the beginning.

fnafHelpWanted2.name: FNAF: Help Wanted 2
fnafHelpWanted2.description: VR terror returns with triple the intensity. Platinum and titanium in virtual nightmares. The sequel to fear. More animatronics, more horror, more everything.

artisticVision.name: Artistic Vision
artisticVision.description: Where creativity meets elegance. Purple dreams flow through gallery walls. Every pixel is a masterpiece, every moment is inspiration. Create without limits.

colorfulCanvas.name: Colorful Canvas
colorfulCanvas.description: Explosion of colors, burst of energy. Neon dreams paint the digital canvas. When creativity knows no bounds, and every idea deserves a rainbow.

designStudio.name: Design Studio
designStudio.description: Professional creativity in perfect balance. Clean blues meet artistic surfaces. Where design thinking meets digital perfection. Your workspace, your masterpiece.

creativeSpark.name: Creative Spark
creativeSpark.description: Ignite your imagination. Magenta and violet dance in aurora light. When inspiration strikes, this theme captures it. Creative energy, unleashed.

pastelDreams.name: Pastel Dreams
pastelDreams.description: Soft, gentle, absolutely dreamy. Pastel colors float on cloud surfaces. When subtlety is strength, and dreams are painted in soft hues.

abstractArt.name: Abstract Art
abstractArt.description: Bold shapes, vibrant colors, pure expression. Royal blues meet abstract surfaces. Where art breaks rules, and creativity sets them free.

executiveSuite.name: Executive Suite
executiveSuite.description: Power meets elegance. Navy precision on premium surfaces. When business is serious, and success is the only option. Command respect, demand excellence.

corporatePower.name: Corporate Power
corporatePower.description: Authority in every pixel. Graphite and steel create unbreakable professionalism. When corporate means powerful, and business means results.

businessClass.name: Business Class
businessClass.description: First-class professionalism. Royal elegance meets platinum precision. When you work at the top, your theme should match. Excellence, elevated.

boardroom.name: Boardroom
boardroom.description: Where decisions are made. Charcoal authority on sophisticated surfaces. Serious business, serious style. When every meeting matters.

prestige.name: Prestige
prestige.description: Luxury defined. Gold and champagne create unparalleled elegance. When status matters, and excellence is expected. Premium by design.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Built for scale. Cobalt strength meets urban surfaces. When business is global, and your theme should match. Enterprise-grade, always.

pureMinimal.name: Pure Minimal
pureMinimal.description: Less is everything. Pure white on snow surfaces. When simplicity is perfection, and every pixel matters. Minimalism, mastered.

cleanSlate.name: Clean Slate
cleanSlate.description: Fresh start, clean design. Graphite precision on ivory surfaces. When clarity is key, and distractions are eliminated. Start fresh, stay focused.

essence.name: Essence
essence.description: The core of minimalism. Mono precision on ultra-clean surfaces. When nothing is everything, and less is infinitely more. Pure essence.

zen.name: Zen
zen.description: Peace in every pixel. Sage tranquility on mist surfaces. When calm is power, and simplicity is wisdom. Find your center.

breath.name: Breath
breath.description: Space to breathe. Silver elegance on pearl surfaces. When minimalism meets comfort, and design takes a breath. Light, airy, perfect.

voidMinimal.name: Void Minimal
voidMinimal.description: Dark minimalism perfected. Pure accents on void surfaces. When darkness is clarity, and emptiness is full. Minimal, dark, absolute.

neonExplosion.name: Neon Explosion
neonExplosion.description: Color bomb detonated. Neon pink, green, and blue collide in electric chaos. When vibrant isn't enough, and energy is everything. Explosive, unstoppable.

electricVibe.name: Electric Vibe
electricVibe.description: Charged with energy. Neon cyan and yellow pulse with laser precision. When electricity flows through your interface, and every click is power.

rainbowBurst.name: Rainbow Burst
rainbowBurst.description: Every color, all at once. Fuchsia, lime, and cyan explode in rainbow glory. When vibrant means everything, and color is king. Burst with energy.

sunsetFury.name: Sunset Fury
sunsetFury.description: Fire in the sky. Vermillion, tangerine, and canary burn with sunset intensity. When warmth meets energy, and colors rage. Sunset, unleashed.

plasmaCore.name: Plasma Core
plasmaCore.description: Plasma energy unleashed. Neon purple and orange pulse with futuristic power. When technology meets vibrancy, and energy is infinite. Core activated.

energyRush.name: Energy Rush
energyRush.description: Pure energy, pure vibrancy. Chartreuse, lime, and neon green create unstoppable momentum. When life needs a boost, this theme delivers. Rush of energy.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: Welcome to Aetheris! By using our service, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any of these terms, please do not use our service.

section2.title: 2. Use of Service
section2.content: You agree to use Aetheris only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. In particular, you agree:
section2.item1: Not to infringe on the intellectual property rights of other users
section2.item2: Not to post content that is illegal, offensive, or violates the rights of others
section2.item3: Not to use the service for spam or unsolicited messages
section2.item4: Not to attempt to gain unauthorized access to systems or data

section3.title: 3. User Content
section3.content: You retain all rights to the content you post on Aetheris. However, by posting content, you grant us a license to use, display, and distribute it within our service. You are solely responsible for all content you post.
section3.item1: You warrant that you have all necessary rights to the content you post
section3.item2: You agree not to post content that infringes on third-party rights
section3.item3: We reserve the right to remove any content that violates our rules
section3.item4: You may delete your content at any time

section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
section4.content: All materials, including design, logos, text, and software of Aetheris, are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, or distribute these materials without our written permission.

section5.title: 5. Termination
section5.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the service at any time if you violate these Terms of Service or for any other reason at our discretion.

section6.title: 6. Disclaimer
section6.content: Aetheris is provided "as is" without any warranties. We do not guarantee that the service will operate without interruption or errors. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use our service.

section7.title: 7. Changes to Terms
section7.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will notify you of significant changes by posting a new version on this page. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

section8.title: 8. Contact Information
section8.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at hello@aetheris.dev.

termsOfService.contact: For questions regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us at hello@aetheris.dev

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: We at Aetheris take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our service.

section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
section2.item1: Authentication information: we use OAuth2 for Google sign-in. We only store a hash of your email address, not the address itself, to ensure maximum security
section2.item2: Profile information: name, bio, avatar, and other information you voluntarily provide
section2.item3: Content: articles, comments, and other content you post
section2.item4: Technical information: IP address, browser type, service usage data

section3.title: 3. How We Use Information
section3.content: We use the collected information to:

section4.title: 4. Data Protection
section4.content: We employ modern encryption and security methods to protect your data. Your email address is stored only as a hash, making it impossible to recover even in the event of a data breach.

section5.title: 5. Information Sharing
section5.content: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties, except when necessary to provide services, required by law, or with your explicit consent.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.content: You have the right to request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data at any time. You may also opt out of receiving marketing messages.

section7.title: 7. Cookies
section7.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve service functionality, analyze usage, and personalize content. You can manage cookie settings in your browser.

section8.title: 8. Policy Changes
section8.content: We may periodically update this Privacy Policy. We will notify you of significant changes by posting a new version on this page.

privacyPolicy.contact: For privacy-related questions, please contact us at hello@aetheris.dev
